content: description the lake house cardigan will be your new favorite warm weather piece the open lace stitches make this cardigan comfy to wear and gives it the perfect drape the fun row repeat will have this cardigan flying off your hook this pattern is free on my blog 1 this pattern is available as a kit with lion brand 2 get all the yarn you need to make your own cardigan + a copy of the pdf digital download crochet pattern i have a full video tutorial available of this pattern 3 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-lake-house-cardigan-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/3n5qt 3 https //youtu be/mezpmx8bvfk
